name: Legend of Kay Anniversary
description: 10 years after its initial release, Legend of Kay - Anniversary is a thoroughly remastered version of the original game: high-resolution textures; new, more detailed character models; modern rendering techniques and crystal-clear surround sound give this great classic a new shine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8.1 32 or 64 bit Processor: Dual Core Processor at 2.0+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
